name: Potatojoe: Stuck in Time
description:
A game we developed for Ludum Dare 47. Unfortunately we barely managed to finish the tutorial area, everthing is still pretty wonky and we even failed to upload the game in time, but we are eager to work on that game. Please have mercy, for nearly all of us this is a first time project. 

The Sprites for the NPCs and the cat are made by https://www.patreon.com/elthe

P.S. if you somehow manage to get to the Credits, congratulations!
